name: YearnfulPracticeMode
description: Enables Practice Mode on player death.

checkpointDelay.name: Checkpoint Delay
checkpointDelay.description:
Adjust the checkpoint delay when flying as a ship, swing, wave, or UFO.

<cy>What's the unit of measurement, you ask?</c>
<cr>Trust me, I wish I knew. At first, I thought it was measured in seconds, but it wasn't, and at this point I can't be bothered to figure it out.</c>

<cr>Just try not to bring CBF into the mix, I guess... ("._.</c>

issues.info: Ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
